attributes.action: Pull Prince Harry Out Of Afghanistan.
attributes.additional_details: Please pull Prince Harry out of Afghanistan. His a major target for the Taliban thus endangering other soldiers lives more than they normally are. The risk is considerably higher now his there. I know that's what he wants but what about the sheer risk factor he brings to the camp his stationed at and those that share it with him. Please bring him out of it, let the non Royal family soldiers do their job without the publicity of Prince Harry hanging over them.
